name: Flatworld 3D
description:
Flatworld 3D is game made during "Gryf Game Jam 2018"  in Poland. It's simple party-game based on pushing  other players off the board. 

Controls:

1.  Keyboard

  • WSAD/Arrows - move
  • Space/Num5 - attack/confirm
  • Esc/Num0 - cancel/ pause menu

2.  Xbox and PS4 controller:

  • Left Analog - move
  • A/Cross - attack/confirm
  • B/Circle - cancel
  • Menu - pause menu
Credits:
  • Paulina 'Zozolka' Kakuba
  • Monika Dalach
  • Hubert Kordacz
  • Wojciech Posmowski
  • Szymon Dudzik
